languages.text: "Я держусь, Ваша Светлость, не беспокойтесь обо мне. Главное — вернуть реликвию..." {n}Фактотум стонет, когда медикарий убирает в сторону насквозь мокрые от крови бинты и неутешительно качает головой.{/n}

"I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я держусь, Ваша Светлость, не беспокойтесь обо мне. Главное — вернуть реликвию..." {n}Фактотум стонет, когда медикарий убирает в сторону насквозь мокрые от крови бинты и неутешительно качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I am holding, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, worry not. What matters is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer moves the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n}

"I am holding, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, worry not. What matters is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer moves the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n}

"I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n}

"I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head disapprovingly.{/n}

"I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}

"I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich halte durch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Keine Sorge. Wichtig ist jetzt nur, dass Ihr das Relikt zurückholt ..." {n}Das Faktotum stöhnt, als der Medicae-Offizier die blutdurchtränkten Bandagen zur Seite zieht und traurig den Kopf schüttelt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich halte durch, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Keine Sorge. Wichtig ist jetzt nur, dass Ihr das Relikt zurückholt ..." {n}Das Faktotum stöhnt, als der Medicae-Offizier die blutdurchtränkten Bandagen zur Seite zieht und traurig den Kopf schüttelt.{/n}

languages.text: «Aguantaré, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Descuide. Ahora lo que importa es que recupere usted la reliquia...». {n}El Factótum gime cuando el oficial de medicae retira las vendas ensangrentadas y menea la cabeza apesadumbrado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Aguantaré, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Descuide. Ahora lo que importa es que recupere usted la reliquia...». {n}El Factótum gime cuando el oficial de medicae retira las vendas ensangrentadas y menea la cabeza apesadumbrado.{/n}

languages.text: 「持ちこたえますとも、陛下。ご心配には及びません。今大事なのは、あなたが聖遺物を取り戻すことです…」{n}ファクトタムはうめき声を上げて、メディケア士官が血まみれの包帯を端に寄せ、悲しげに首を横に振る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「持ちこたえますとも、陛下。ご心配には及びません。今大事なのは、あなたが聖遺物を取り戻すことです…」{n}ファクトタムはうめき声を上げて、メディケア士官が血まみれの包帯を端に寄せ、悲しげに首を横に振る。{/n}

languages.text: “我还能挺得住，大人，不用担心。当务之急是夺回圣物……”{n}高阶顾问呻吟起来。医务官解开了他鲜血淋漓的绷带，悲伤地摇着头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我还能挺得住，大人，不用担心。当务之急是夺回圣物……”{n}高阶顾问呻吟起来。医务官解开了他鲜血淋漓的绷带，悲伤地摇着头。{/n}

languages.text: « Je tiens bon, Votre Seigneurie, ne vous en faites pas. Tout ce qui compte, c'est que vous récupériez la relique... » {n}Le factotum gémit alors que l'officier de medicae écarte les bandages imbibés de sang et secoue la tête d'un air lugubre.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je tiens bon, Votre Seigneurie, ne vous en faites pas. Tout ce qui compte, c'est que vous récupériez la relique... » {n}Le factotum gémit alors que l'officier de medicae écarte les bandages imbibés de sang et secoue la tête d'un air lugubre.{/n}

languages.text: "Dayanıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Endişe etmeyin. Şu an en önemli olan şey yadigârı geri almanız." {n}Sıhhiye subayı kana bulanmış bandajları çekip başını acılı acılı sallarken Kâhya homurdanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I am holding on, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Worry not. What matters now is that you recover the relic..." {n}The Factotum groans as the medicae officer pulls the blood-soaked bandages aside and shakes his head dolefully.{/n}
